title: Has Google fixed the Android 10 update speaker malfunction issue?
content: Six months ago I attempted the Android 10 update for my Pixel 3a XL three times and each time the speaker / microphone stopping working requiring that I replace the phone entirely. I want to download Android 10 but I fear another replacement forthcoming. Has Google addressed this serious issue and can Google offer any form of guarantee that this will not occur a fourth time?
